module.name: dmidecode
module.summary: Decode DMI data for x86/ia64 bioses.

interface.name: dmidecode_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute dmidecode in the dmidecode domain.

interface.name: dmidecode_run
interface.summary: Execute dmidecode in the dmidecode domain, and allow the specified role the dmidecode domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the dmidecode domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the dmidecode domain to use.
